links.*: J.R.R. Tolkien: Myth, Morality and Religion
Lord of Elves And Eldils: Fantasy And Philosophy in C.S. Lewis And J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
'''Richard L. Purtill''' (born [[1931]]) is the Professor Emeritus of Philosophy at [[wikipedia:Western Washington University|Western Washington University]]. He is an author of fantasy and science fiction, publishing books in the ''Kaphtu'' series.

* [[1974]]: ''[[Lord of Elves And Eldils: Fantasy And Philosophy in C.S. Lewis And J.R.R. Tolkien]]''
* [[1984]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Myth, Morality and Religion]]''
===Articles===
* [[1979]]: ''[[Mythlore 22]]''
** "Heaven and Other Perilous Realms"
==Awards==
* [[1987]]: '''[[Mythopoeic Society|Mythopoeic Award]]''', Mythopoeic Scholarship Award for Inkling Studies, ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Myth, Morality and Religion]]''
